title.rendered: In Video: Friends from Russia and Ukraine calls for peace and love from Dubai

content.rendered: Dubai: Two expats are hoping to take their message of love and peace from Dubai to Ukraine where attacks from Russia over the past week have left thousands dead and millions displaced.

excerpt.rendered:
Dubai: Two expats are hoping to take their message of love and peace from Dubai to Ukraine where attacks from Russia over the past week have left thousands dead and millions displaced.

Learn More
